name: Astro Nell
description:
Astro Nell is a flick-screen platform game for the unexpanded Vic-20 computer.

Requires either a PAL/NTSC machine/emulator and a joystick to play.

Collect all the space stars to fuel Nell's crashed spaceship.   It's a very difficult game but can be completed without cheating and has an end screen.   Source code and a map of the play area is also included in the download.
